data.name: Net Ball
data.summary: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.
data.description:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon.  If the wild Pokémon is []{type:water}- or []{type:bug}-type, this ball has a catch rate of 3×.  Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
